article_metadata.title: Fact-checking Sen. Marco Rubio | Miami Herald

og.description: PolitFact Florida has fact-checked Sen. Marco Rubio 85 times on a variety of claims, including about climate change, Common Core, Cuba, the federal health care law, foreign affairs,guns, poverty, space and technology.
